about.welcomeText: Hey there ! Welcome to my portfolio.
description: Data Scientist and Analyst who loves working with AI, ML and NLP.
A unique blend of Technology, Economics, and AI & ML separates me from the rest, allowing me to provide technically backed financial insights and analysis.

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: Expertise in Pandas, NumPy and NLP pipelines.

education.institution: Université Marie et Louis Pasteur, Besançon
education.description: Economics blended with IT, focusing on Data Intelligence.

education.institution: Rungta College of Engineering and Technology, IN

description: • Developed an automated data mining and monitoring pipeline in Pipedream, enabling real-time collection of social media data from over 5 platforms including Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, Bluesky, and CloudMedia, increasing data retrieval efficiency.
• Engineered and optimized data pipelines by filtering, cleaning, and structuring over 28k Instagram Visibrain datasets, enhancing machine learning model accuracy.
• Implemented LLM-based pipelines (ChatGPT API) for sentiment analysis, text extraction, and visual content interpretation with OCR & image captioning (GPT-4v Vision API / JinaAI SceneXplain).
• Conducted the “Migration Project”, leveraging NLP and multimodal data analysis to study online narratives around immigration policy.
• Integrated textual and visual embeddings to enhance sentiment and narrative detection, supporting model-driven insight generation.
• Managed data workflows including cleaning, validation, preprocessing, modeling, and importing.
• Performed SQL-based data extraction, updates, and database operations for efficient management.
•  Developed advanced Excel reporting tools, including pivot tables, queries, and macros.
• Designed and maintained Power BI dashboards to support data-driven decision-making.
• Implemented RPA tools(uiPath) to automate repetitive tasks and streamline operational processes.

projects.title: Impact of Scholarship in Academic Performance & Outcome
description: 1. What is the difference in academic performance (first- and second-year grades) between scholarship recipients and non-recipients in the BDEEM Economics program?
2. Does receiving a scholarship influence student attendance and participation in the program?
3. How does attendance impact academic performance in the BDEEM Economics program, particularly for scholarship recipients compared to non-recipients?
4. How do the Matthew and Pygmalion Effects influence the academic success of scholarship recipients, particularly in terms of compounding advantages and higher expectations?

projects.title: Analyzing the Dynamics of Competition Policy: Insights from Antitrust and Growth
description: 1. Does implementing the new model help us better track competition policy?
2. Comparison between the new model and the old model with a detailed analysis.
3. Identification of major factors affecting and shaping the policy.
4. Challenges and limitations of the study, with a focus on the comparison between the old model and the new model.

projects.title: Predicting the Sale Price of Bulldozers using Machine Learning
description: 1. Kaggle Compitition on Bulldozer price prediction
2. To predict the price with lowest possible RMSLE
3. RMSLE acheived 0.24 (Ranked < 30 on kaggle)

projects.title: Heart disease classification
description: 1. Heart disease classification & prediction.
2. Which characteristics contribute most to a model predicting whether someone has heart disease or not?
3. Logistic regression model with hyperparameter tuning.

projects.title: Eurimobility SA strategy case study
description: 1. Develop strategy to reallocate dependecny from Asian Supplier
2. Simulate Risks, S1: Chip Shortage, S2: Trade War, S3: Logistics Crisis
3. Stragitically find low performing Asian Suppliers and replace with European counterpart.
4. Used K-mean cluster to idenity the risk suppliers
5. Used Kraljic Matrix to Identify New supplier with Bargaining Power assesment.

blog.title: The Future of AI in Economics
blog.description: How digital economics is reshaping financial markets.
